definition: the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Experiment results show that those approaches have good real -time performance and vivid effect.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果表明，该算法达到了较好的实时性和真实感。

sentences.english: Photorealistic and sparkly screen-printed graphics at front.
sentences.chinese: 闪闪发光的真实感和丝网印刷在前面的图形。

sentences.english: This image needs to be photorealistic and automatically generated.
sentences.chinese: 此图片需要真实感和自动生成。

sentences.english: The slumped physicality of this Christ, however, is almost miraculous.
sentences.chinese: 但基督瘫软的身体则具有一种奇迹般的真实感。

sentences.english: Realistic appearance, the use of more realistic , non-polluting, more environmentally.
sentences.chinese: 外形逼真，使用更具真实感，无污染，更环保。

sentences.english: Conversely, mathematical structures have an eerily real feel to them.
sentences.chinese: 反过来说，数学结构也具有令人发毛的真实感。

sentences.english: Per-pixel lighting is a major advance to photo-realistic images.
sentences.chinese: 象素光照是在向照片级真实感图像发展中的一大步。

sentences.english: That's the way it has to be, everything proper , Keepin it always true.
sentences.chinese: 人生就是这样，总是有困难，让生活更有真实感。

sentences.english: Miriam text to overcome the non-store direct marketers of non-realistic.
sentences.chinese: 克服无店铺文仪直销商的不真实感。

sentences.english: This allows for photo realistic images and renderings.
sentences.chinese: 这样就可以得到真实感的图像及渲染效果。

sentences.english: To accomplish non-photorealistic pictures, researchers have studied and found many effective methods.
sentences.chinese: 为了得到非真实感图片，人们研究了各种方法。

sentences.english: The core and the base of the virtual walkthroughs is the real graphic scene's producing and rendering.
sentences.chinese: 其核心和基础是真实感图形的实时生成和绘制。

sentences.english: Besides, the authors make a suggestion on how the automatic plotting of terrain perspective graphy with high level of reality can ber…
sentences.chinese: 此外，还对生成高度真实感地形透视图提出了建议。

sentences.english: Realistic appearance, the use of more realistic , non-polluting, more environmentally friendly.
sentences.chinese: 外形逼真，使用更具真实感，无污染，更环保。

definition: the feeling of actually being there
(idiom) to experience it for oneself/to actually *be* there (as opposed to reading about it etc)
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
real scene (not set up or posed)/real location (not a film studio set or theater)/live action (not animation)
